programme.title: Better Plan for Better Life
programme.desc: In the new era of intelligent manufacturing, scientific and technological achievement intertwine with family life through high-speed rail, smart homes, global online shopping, convenient smart phone mobile platforms, and cashless payments.

programme.title: The Queen of News
programme.desc: At a college forum, guest speaker SNK News anchor Man Wai-sum colludes with an inquisitive student to embarrass Kwong Cheung Heavy Industries chairman Dr Lo.

programme.title: The Queen of News
programme.desc: Wai-sum interviews Kwong Cheung Heavy Industries chairman Dr Lo, who was embarrassed by her at the forum.

programme.title: The Queen of News
programme.desc: Hiu-mei is framed by Sze-ching. She ends up feeling depressed and having a breakdown in the powder room.

programme.title: The Queen of News
programme.desc: Yip Sun becomes the new president, and Wai-sum wins another battle.

programme.title: The Queen of News
programme.desc: Lau Yim is drenched in blood. She takes precious first-hand pictures.

programme.title: Bullet and Brain
programme.desc: A sharpshooter and his ingenious partner, known as Bullet and Brain, must protect the personal finances of a criminal.

programme.title: The Glory of Global Chinese
programme.desc: Experience Jake Pinnick’s extraordinary odyssey from Wudang Mountain, an acclaimed UNESCO World Heritage site and birthplace of Taoist martial arts, to mastering ancient kung fu and Taoist music, forging a transcultural bridge between Eastern and Western civilizations through the universal wisdom of Taoist philosophy.

programme.title: My One in a Million
programme.desc: Shu Yu asks Zi Hao how she can help Ding Yi with his problem. Zi Hao reveals to her that the person Ding Yi likes is actually her. He advises Shu Yu to be honest with herself if she also likes Ding Yi. Shu Yu recalls the interactions she had with Ding Yi, and is convinced that Ding Yi holds a special place in her heart. She begins avoiding Kent.

programme.title: My One in a Million
programme.desc: Ding Yi and Violet work together to expose Kent's true colors in front of Shu Yu. Kent denies the accusations and pushes the blame on Violet. Violet is disappointed in Kent, and storms off after slapping him. Ding Yi uses the chance to confess to Shu Yu, but she rejects him, worried that Ding Yi will suffer from bad luck.

programme.title: My One in a Million
programme.desc: Zhen Qing and Zheng Hong are in the midst of a wedding photoshoot, when Carol appears to take revenge on Zhen Qing, upon Kent's instigation. However, she harms Shu Yu by accident, and Ding Yi is stabbed by Carol while trying to protect Shu Yu. Shu Yu is convinced that Ding Yi was injured because of her so she treats Ding Yi coldly, and intentionally says harsh words to push him away.

programme.title: My One in a Million
programme.desc: Crystal, a matchmaker in a web-series, claims that she can give blessings and see the red thread of fate between couples. She helps Yi Chun to find her other half, Titus, but Shu Yu can see Yi Chun's red thread of fate is actually tied to Xiao Mi, and exposes Crystal as a fake. Unhappy with Shu Yu's treatment of Ding Yi, Yi Chun takes Crystal's side.

programme.title: My One in a Million
programme.desc: Shu Yu tells Ding Yi that until she stops seeing the red thread of fate between couples, she cannot date. Her Grand Aunt says she lost her ability after matching 9999 couples, and that this number could be the key. Shu Yu laments that she does not know how long it will take to matchmake so many couples. Knowing this, will Ding Yi still be willing to wait for her?

programme.title: The Glory of Global Chinese
programme.desc: Experience Jake Pinnick’s extraordinary odyssey from Wudang Mountain, an acclaimed UNESCO World Heritage site and birthplace of Taoist martial arts, to mastering ancient kung fu and Taoist music, forging a transcultural bridge between Eastern and Western civilizations through the universal wisdom of Taoist philosophy.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: Shi Qiang is assigned an assistant, Xu Bing Bing, an information security expert transferred from the Criminal Investigation Brigade who shares information about Ye Wen Jie, the only other scientist that Shen Yu Fei contacted who is still alive.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: Wang Miao accesses the Three-Body game and enters during the the so-called "Era of Chaos" where the movement of the sun is completely chaotic and unpredictable, creating an environment that is hard to survive in.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: Wang Miao witnesses the destruction of Civilization 137 in the game. After leaving the game, Wang Miao finds the extreme realism, and the ability to design and produce such a reality, unimaginable.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: Chang Wei Si interrogates Hu Xiaoxi whose deliberate provocation does not deter him. Pan Han, who is secretly manipulating everything, quarrel's with Shen Yu Fei about her failure to stop Wang Miao from continuing his research.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: Xu Bing Bing tries to trace Yang Dong's activities and frame of mind before her death, and learns that she was ready to give up her research on theoretical physics to devote herself to home life before she suddenly committed suicide.

programme.title: Wisdom Tooth
programme.desc: At the edge of adulthood, a once dependent and innocent girl has to confront the mysterious, contaminated and dangerous side of life, where the torture of secrets and jealousy is also a catalyst for her awakening.

programme.title: Explore China Shorts
programme.desc: Hal challenges hot peppers in one of the largest spice markets in Chengdu.
